akn:subsection.akn:heading: Additional Equity Because of Increased Risks.—

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Notwithstanding any other provision of this chapter, the Secretary or Administrator may make a determination that an application under this title requires additional equity because of increased risk factors associated with markets, technology, or financial structures.
